== Kubuntu 14.10 Beta 2 ==

Kubuntu 14.10 Beta 2 is available for testing.  Try it out now if you want to help debug before our release in October 2014.

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="background:#D2FCFF; margin: 0 0 1em 1em;" style="width:50%; padding:0.5em;"> '''Download a Plasma 4 Disk Image (Stable)'''<<BR>>Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/utopic|Bootable image]]</nowiki> and put it onto a <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto|DVD]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick|USB Drive]]</nowiki>
| '''Download a Plasma 5 Disk Image (Tech Preview)'''<<BR>>Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu-plasma5/releases/utopic|Bootable image]]</nowiki> and put it onto a <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto|DVD]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick|USB Drive]]</nowiki>
|-
| '''Upgrading from 14.04LTS'''<<BR>> To upgrade to Kubuntu 14.10 pre-releases from 14.04LTS, run ''kubuntu-devel-release-upgrade'' from a command line.<<BR>>  <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UtopicUpgrades/Kubuntu|Full instructions to upgrade from 14.04 LTS]]</nowiki>.
| '''Install Plasma 5 on 14.10'''<<BR>>You can install Plasma 5 on a 14.10 install--it will remove your stable software. In a console, do `sudo apt-add-repository ppa:kubuntu-ppa/next && sudo apt update && sudo apt install kubuntu-plasma5-desktop && sudo apt full-upgrade`.
|}

=== Plasma 5 ===

This is the first Beta release of our Technical Preview of Plasma 5.  It has plenty of known bugs, see below, but also plenty of lovely new features.  The <nowiki>[[http://www.kde.org/announcements/plasma5.0/|Plasma 5.0 release announcement]]</nowiki> has more information.

== Kubuntu Known Problems ==

<nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/RmgXgX|Bugs tagged Kubuntu 14.10 bugs list]]</nowiki>

* (Bug:1334189) syslinux offers no OEM mode on Kubuntu Utopic Alpha 1
* (Bug:1371651) does not boot into graphical interface after installation on VirtualBox

== Kubuntu Plasma 5 Known Problems ==

<nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/B527rj| Kubuntu Plasma 5 bugs list]]</nowiki>

* (Bug:1362598) No Install icon on desktop
* (Bug:1362599) ubiquity-dm does not allow live desktop on live system
* (Bug:1362746) permissions issue
* (Bug:1362747) No web browser in app menu
* (Bug:1362750) qt and gtk themes not set up by default
* (Bug:1362753) khelpcenter docs misses any themeing
* (Bug:1362754) plasma5 phonon kcm misses icons
* (Bug:1362757) no sddm kcm
* (Bug:1362759) libreoffice not themed 

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 14.10, the Utopic Unicorn, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs/laptops/netbooks]]</nowiki>.
